title: Craig Williams – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Craig Williams, the Conservative MP for Montgomeryshire, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
I can think of no one better to lead our party and tackle the serious issues we face than Rishi Sunak. His experience and steady hand is exactly what the country and party needs right now.
